title: Banned for telling chinese speaker go play on chinese servers?
body:
This guy only spoke chinese and very very very broken english but would constantly spam ping when ANYONE would die so i got mad and said basically he should be banned from NA servers and go play on chinese servers since he only spoke chinese and only said things like "fuck u mom" in english, im pretty sure that is the majority of my reason for a 14 day ban. there was a second game cited in which i responded rudely to troll, which i understand is another part of my ban. I dont see how its fair considering hes playing on a primarily english speaking server and speaks no english except to insult people. Also, i speak some chinese and most of what he said in chinese was rude too...soooooooooooooo. This isnt an appeal to overturn my ban. This is just how ridiculous the race issue is and how broad the "hate speech" report can be. Its honestly sad.

Edit: oh yeah, the chinese guy was first pick and just PICKS jinx and expects our adc to swap with him? like regardless of what she wants. then when she doesnt he starts cursing her out in chinese/broken english in champ select.

replies.body:
You were not banned for this. This is one of the multiple games given to you as evidence. You need to take all the evidence given into account.

Additionally, this is your 8th penalty so it was likely escalated in severity.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Y6tZvYUb,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-04-03T22:17:37.354+0000)
>
> You were not banned for this. This is one of the multiple games given to you as evidence. You need to take all the evidence given into account.
> 
> Additionally, this is your 8th penalty so it was likely escalated in severity.

Oooff... getting called out on cutting and pasting selective chat logs.

Remember that misrepresenting things to the forum actually does no good because we are here to help you understand your punishment. Only player behavior specialists can help you reverse a false positive punishment. 

Trying to convince us a partial truth is a whole truth is a waste of your time and a waste of our time because you won't learn how to reform because you're hiding the true nature of your punishment, which ultimately means you will continue to make the same toxic mistakes, which will get you permabanned in the long run.

Is misrepresenting the facts and trying to get sympathy really worth losing champs, skins, emotes, etc...? Be honest with yourself and be honest with the forums. It's the only way to make sure you are on the path to reform so you don't lose your account.

You're right to expect English, French, or Spanish on a North American server. Language barriers are difficult in League. But that's what Pings are for. Also, your attitude wasn't necessary. "You're already getting deported to China." I understand your frustrations, but that wasn't needed. Choose your wording more carefully in the future, bro.

Honestly I think context should be taken into account. But yeah, my wording was terribly chosen. It seemed like an apt metaphor since his reprehensible behavior was certainly worthy of a ban in my opinion.

>Yiff My Tailhole: well. hopefully after this you will be banned and will go back to playing on chinese servers
Yiff My Tailhole: noone knows wtf you are saying
Yiff My Tailhole: dude who taught you english?
Yiff My Tailhole: you're already getting deported to china so shut up already

If you were an English-only speaking person playing on a different server, would you appreciate this same language thrown your way?

why the fuck would i be that stupid? if i went to a chinese server i would obviously use what little chinese i know to speak chinese. not go "cao ni ma. ni ma san ba" and other such idiocy. in addition i would learn pertinent phrases. and i most certainly would never act like that person did regardless of server.  are you really defending the fact that the only english the guy used was to curse people out? dont speak in ridiculous hypotheticals and most certainly dont presume i would ever act like that scum bag.

In regards to most of the text you cited, this is where context comes into play. "noone knows wtf you are saying" was said because he was speaking in chinese characters.
dude who taught you english? was because LITERALLY ALL HE SAID IS "fuk u mom" and other such obscenities.
as for the other two remarks. it is my sincere hope that person isnt playing on NA servers any more as they made no effort to communicate with the team save for throwing obscenities and vitriol around and otherwise spam pinging peoples death timers.

I'm only talking about your logs and your actions. Every player is held responsible for their own actions; neither you nor the other player are exempt from that. 

There is no context that makes the quoted parts, as well as other parts of your chat, ok to use in League.

> ...dont speak in ridiculous hypotheticals...

It's not a ridiculous hypothetical. Some non-English speaking people are bound to be playing on the NA server, and you being a jerk to them because they don't speak English is as bad as the player you got punished for harassing being equally bad with what little English he could/may have known.

Granted, if they don't speak English, there's a fair chance they might not understand it, but regardless, that doesn't give you the right to be an asshole to them.

> ...and most certainly dont presume i would ever act like that scum bag.

They're not. They are simply saying, "if you played on a different server that primarily speaked a non-English language, would you be okay with people being assholes to you for not being able to speak their language?"

Nowhere do they bring up the thought of you acting like the other player, and they certainly aren't defending their misbehavior. They are trying to get you to understand _your_ misbehavior.
If I was Riot I'd ban the Chinese guy, but also the OP just for his username. Also, this is apparently just one of many games that got the guy banned.
NA server may be a primary English language server, but it certainly not the rule to speak ONLY English.  You are banned for being a rude jerk.  Don't try to place blame on someone else.
Yea, you should have just muted
surprised he didn't get perm ban for what he typed

You are being punished for your behavior. there are right and wrong ways to tackle situations and your text from the chat log was inappropriate. If the other player was being toxic and trolling, mute them, and report them. Then they will be the one who gets banned and in trouble while you can keep playing the game. It isn't necessary to respond back, to get back at a person. Let the system do it's job. Also be aware that you are probably on thin ice now that you were banned.
